original_title: Las AAA son las tres armas: Carta abierta de Rodolfo Walsh a la junta militar
overview: Short about the disappearance of the body of the political Argentinean writer Rodolfo Walsh after he was shot in an ambush by a special military group in Argentinia on March 25 1977.
title: Las AAA son las tres armas: Carta abierta de Rodolfo Walsh a la junta militar
